body.name: Zone Tech 12V Stainless Steel Saucepan, 2-Quart Premium Quality Non-stick Saucepan with Glass Vented Lid, Stay-cool Handle, Rapid Heat Up, Portable, Perfect For Camping, Picnic and more
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 53 mins
features: 12V POWER SUPPLY - Zone Tech Stainless Steel Suace Pan has a 12V power supply with integrated overheating protection that is dependable and safe for usage in homes and cars.
NON-STICK & EASY TO CLEAN- Zone Tech Stainless Steel Sauce Pan has a non-stick cooking surface that simplifies the process of cleaning and cooking.
COMPACT & PORTABLE- Zone Tech Stainless Steel Sauce Pan is a small compact size (7.5" Diameter ) perfect for small personal servings with a 6.3 lbs. capacity.
TEMPERED VENTED GLASS LID- The tempered glass lid with a cool-touch knob prevents cooking platters and keeps food warm.
VERSATILE SAUCE PAN-It is designed for multi-cooking purposes, ideal for boiling, sautéing, and frying a variety of meals.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Introducing the Zone Tech Portable Saucepan, the perfect cooking companion for outdoor adventurers, campers, and travelers!
It has compact size makes it easy storage and transport.
This stainless steel sauce pan is designed to withstand the toughest conditions, making it perfect for cooking on the go. With its non-stick coating, you can cook your favorite meals with ease

Is the saucepan durable? Yes. It is made of stainless steel can sustain high cooking temperatures without warping. Making it great for cooking on the go. What is the size of the pan? Zone Tech Stainless Steel Sauce Pan is a small compact size 7.5" Diameter. What is the loading capacity of the sauce pan? Zone Tech Stainless Steel Saucepan has a 6.3 lbs. capacity perfect for small personal servings while travelling. Is it easy to use? Yes. Plugs it directly into a 12-Volt power port.
Previous page Next page 1 Use for Camping 2 Easy to Use 3 Versatile
Zone Tech Portable Sauce Pan-Cooking on the Go!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little camping pot
reviews.reviewText: This saucepan is a great little pot for camping. It’s perfectly sized for warming soup, a can of beans, a box of mac and cheese or even just boiling water for cocoa. It heats up fast and it’s nonstick so cleanup is easy. The lid helps a lot with efficiency and the vent helps prevent bubbling over. I plug this in my car lighter or, if I need more portability, my portable power station. It works very well for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel!
reviews.reviewText: This has been perfect for trips in our small rv. The rv has a fridge but no way to cook food so this pot here has been our go to for preparing meals. It is high quality - the stainless steel construction ensures durability. I also don’t have to worry about my food sticking to the surface as it is truly non-stick. This also makes clean up easy. I can simply wipe it clean with a paper towel. It heats up quickly. It is compact and lightweight, it doesn’t take up much room which is important in small areas such as our rv.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a useful pan to travel with
reviews.reviewText: Love that this frying pan comes with a glass lid and that the pan itself is quite deep as works well as a frying pan but also as a ‘saucepan’.The cable is long enough to be able to plug it in and comfortably use in our cars trunk and is ideal for cooking hotdogs when back from a hike.The non-stick makes it very easy to cook without needing additional oil, it heats up quickly and I’ve found it very easy to clean up afterwards.Would also be great for tailgates and camping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This stainless steel saucepan has become my go-to for cooking on the go!! It's the perfect size, and the non-stick surface makes cleaning up a breeze. The glass vented lid is nice and lets you keep an eye on your food while it cooks.I've taken it camping, to tailgates, and picnics, and it has never let me down! Lol. The quality is great and it's incredibly portable. If you need a reliable saucepan for various occasions, this one is a winner. It's made my outdoor cooking experiences much simpler and more enjoyable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Take it to an apartment
reviews.reviewText: If you don’t have a large stove in your house and need a back up frying pan, this might be a good idea. I thought this was nice to have if you need to use a frying pan and a pinch with a heat source.I think it’s great that it’s portable and it’s relatively easy to pack into a backpack if you’re planning to take a camping or something like that.
